newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan stocks seen mixed in dull trading.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan stocks seen mixed in dull trading.

text.p: Pakistani stocks are likely to stay mixed in low-key trading when the market reopens on Monday after a four-day Eid al-Adha holiday, dealers said.

"Trading is likely to remain dull and the index will move in a narrow band because of the lack of interest from investors," dealer Rony Byramjee said. "The country's grim economic outlook continues to be a dampening factor."
On Wednesday, the index rose 3.02 points, or 0.20 percent, to end at 1,522.60. Losers led gainers 154 to 74 in a turnover of 45 million shares. -- Amir Zia 9221-5685192
